distortionPreset.code: ota = mix(ta, tiltAngle / 360.0, tiltAngleOverride); ote = mix(te, tiltElevation, tiltElevationOverride);

param.name: tiltAngleOverride
param.toolTip: Enables or disables overriding the tilt angle. Numbers between 0 and 1 will mix the actual angle of your pen with the angle you specified.

param.name: tiltElevationOverride
param.toolTip: Enables or disables overriding the tilt elevation. Numbers between 0 and 1 will mix the actual tilt elevation of your pen with the tilt elevation you specified.
